long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily, compare products whilst browsing Amazon from every major retailer! Supercharge Amazon product pages by integrating price comparison results from ALL major retailers, right where you need them, ensuring you ALWAYS get the best deal!

* Hunt Smart - No more tedious searching. CompareHero brings the prices from every major retailer to you when browsing Amazon. 

* Shop With Confidence - Know you're getting the absolute best deal every time you shop with our Amazon Price Comparison extension!

* Seamless Experience - Just browse Amazon as normal and we'll do the price comparison for you!

* Global Support - CompareHero works across all Amazon regions.
